Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.actions

Most code that implements SEURAT actions is located in the monster class that sets up the Rationale Explorer view.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AssociateAlternative This class is used to associate an alternative with the Java code that implements it.
AssociateArtifactAction This class performs the associate in a different direction - it is an option on the alternative and will associate that alternative with whatever code element happens to be selected in the Java Package Explorer.
OpenRationale This class is used to open the SEURAT rationale database associated with an Eclipse project.
RemoveBookmarkAssociation This class removes associations with the code.
RemoveRationaleAssociation Removes the associations for a file.
RestoreAssociations This class restores associations from the database.
 

Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.actions Description

Most code that implements SEURAT actions is located in the monster class that sets up the Rationale Explorer view. This package gives code for actions that create and remove associations.
